clab:head.clab:title: List Managers/Brokers | D&B For Your Customers

clab:content.p: Help your customers select the best marketing list to maximize the efficiency and effectiveness of their marketing spend.

clab:body.p: Your customers need to find and market to tens of millions of businesses in the United States and globally. They need to be able to perform counts, and define their own lists based on specific criteria, including location, SIC, annual sales, size, and many other factors.
clab:body.h2: How D&B For Your Customers helps you
clab:body.p: Our U.S. (DMI) and Global (WorldBase) databases are among the largest in the world, and provide you and your customers with access to the insight they need to decide with confidence. We have hundreds of selectors, including our unique 8-digit SIC code. With easy integration into your systems and processes and unparalleled depth of information, your customers will rely on you for current, accurate business marketing lists.
clab:body.h3: The extraordinary depth, breadth, and quality of our data sets us apart.

ul.li: The D&B Global Database is the largest single source of local and global business data in the world, with information on more than 140 million global businesses in more than 190 countries (14 million U.S. businesses, nearly 1 million Canadian businesses, more than 27 million business contacts, and 11 million new and emerging businesses).

Our world-class DUNSRight® Quality Process—with more than 2,000 separate automated and manual checks, and data updated more than 1.5 million times daily—ensures insight that is accurate, complete, timely, consistent and, most importantly, actionable.

clab:body.h3: Our database building and management capabilities are one-of-a-kind.

ul.li: Our patented Entity Matching technology and unique expertise enable you and your customers to effectively match and link similar data and maintain its quality over time.
Our globally recognized D-U-N-S® Number acts as a key for data, provides continuity and consistency, and eliminates records duplication.

clab:body.h3: Our uniquely qualified consultative team has your back.

ul.li: Specialized D&B Relationship Managers have the expertise, insight, and flexibility to help you successfully integrate D&B data and solutions into your offerings.
Our one-touch dedicated “For Your Customers” customer hotline is at your service.
